title: Looking For People to Level an Account With
body:
Hey guys,

Just looking for a bunch of people to grind out bot games with and level up accounts

Add my account I'm levelling or comment below if interested.
Smurf IGN- Fennixx

Cheers

replies.body:
Will add you whenever im on my smurf next. What lvl are you now?
Smurf ign: Two Shiv Poison
Levelling a smurf account, its pretty boring alone so I'm trying to find other people to do it with
